# icManufacturerCode

**Instance Property**

The IC manufacturer code of the tag.

## Declaration

```swift
var icManufacturerCode: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

The IC manufacturer code comes from bits 49 through 56 of the [doc://com.apple.corenfc/documentation/CoreNFC/NFCISO15693Tag/identifier] data, in accordance with ISO/IEC 7816-6:2004.

## Getting Tag Information

- **icSerialNumber**: The IC serial number assigned to the tag by the manufacturer.
- **identifier**: The unique hardware identifier of the tag.
